reviews: I recently purchased the transparent iPhone 15 case, and I couldn't be more thrilled with my decision. The precise cutouts ensure that the camera lenses remain shielded from scratches and smudges, maintaining the clarity of every photo. The added peace of mind knowing my expensive iPhone 15 is safeguarded in style is truly priceless.The case fits like a glove, providing a snug yet easy-to-install experience. The raised edges around the screen and camera offer an extra layer of defense against accidental drops. I appreciate the thoughtful design that doesn't compromise on functionality.In terms of durability, this case has exceeded my expectations. The transparent material is of high quality, resistant to yellowing over time, and doesn't interfere with wireless charging. It strikes the perfect balance between form and function.If you're in the market for a transparent iPhone 15 case that seamlessly combines aesthetics with protection, look no further. This case has become an indispensable accessory for my iPhone, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking to showcase and safeguard their device. Five stars well-deserved!

name: ESR for iPhone 15 Pro Max Case, Compatible with MagSafe, Military-Grade Protection, Yellowing Resistant, Scratch-Resistant Back, Magnetic Phone Case for iPhone 15 Pro Max, Classic Series, Clear
reviews: I recently purchased the ESR iPhone 15 Plus Clear Case (image above), and I couldn't be more thrilled with my decision. This case offers the perfect blend of style, durability, and functionality, making it a must-have accessory for any iPhone 15 Plus owner.First and foremost, the quality of this case is outstanding. The clear design allows the sleek beauty of the iPhone 15 Plus to shine through, while also providing excellent protection against scratches, scuffs, and minor drops. The material feels sturdy and well-made, giving me confidence that my device is safe and secure at all times.One of the things I love most about this case is its minimalist design. It adds virtually no bulk to the phone, maintaining the slim profile that I love about the iPhone 15 Plus. Plus, the clear finish and MagSafe ring gives it a modern and sophisticated look that complements the device perfectly.In terms of functionality, this case delivers on all fronts. The precise cutouts for the camera, ports, and buttons ensure easy access to all the features of the iPhone 15 Plus without any hindrance. The raised edges around the screen and camera also provide added protection against scratches and damage when placed on flat surfaces. And even the MagSafe ring that allows you to magnetically and wirelessly charge your phone on the go!Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the iPhone 15 Plus Clear Case. It offers high-quality protection without sacrificing style, making it well worth the investment. If you're in the market for a clear case for your iPhone 15 Plus, look no further - this one is a clear winner!

name: ESR for iPhone 15 Pro Max Case, Compatible with MagSafe, Military-Grade Protection, Yellowing Resistant, Scratch-Resistant Back, Magnetic Phone Case for iPhone 15 Pro Max, Classic Series, Clear
reviews: 3/1/24 Below is my original review and this update is based on a replacement case I received from the company.  It‚Äôs true I was not pleased with the type of case o originally ordered due to its lack of protection & durability.  Lenka reached out and offered a refund and the option to try a different case-one with a clear back, tougher durable silicone around the edges & with MagSafe.  I am beyond happy with the new case.  The silicone edges are much more durable and dust does not stick to it.  The clear back shows off the beautiful black titanium phone and the case fits rather snug but not too much that makes it difficult to remove.  And they sent the black color which I love-I‚Äôm not big on flashy colors.  So props to the seller for making sure their customers are happy.  I already own two different ESR phone windshield mounts-both MagSafe but one with wireless charging and one without so I can plug the phone into my cars data port.  My son has an older car so I wanted one he could just toss on and start charging.  Thank you for looking out for your customers!Let‚Äôs start with the positive-very soft silicone material that has a good grip to it, MagSafe works well, good protection around the camera lenses.  I actually liked it until I put it on my phone.  The area around the charging port is extremely flimsy and I can tell it will be ripped in no time.  I have found this to be a problem in many cases I‚Äôve tried.  I just can‚Äôt be bothered to return it.  I‚Äôll use it until my Totallee cases come in.

I like that it has raised bumpers on the corners and it also has a phone accessory holes on the lower left hand side. I can't remember the last time I've had that on a phone case! I am also happy that the magnetic grip is very strong as they state to the point that I have to pry off my popsocket to remove it. Guaranteed to hold and not just fall off. Overall, I love it.
